criteria.name: Worksheet generation speed
criteria.metric: Time from submit to first streamed content
criteria.notes: Streaming first content, not full worksheet. Full generation may take 10-15s but user sees progress.

criteria.name: Generated content is grade-appropriate
criteria.metric: Accuracy of generated questions against grade-level standards
criteria.threshold: > 90% accuracy on manual review of 20 samples
criteria.notes: Review sample should span at least 3 grade levels and 3 math domains

criteria.name: Generation completes without error
criteria.metric: Percentage of generation requests that complete successfully
criteria.notes: Track via error rate monitoring. Includes LLM timeouts and malformed responses.

criteria.name: Teacher creates worksheet quickly
criteria.metric: Time from wizard start to worksheet preview
criteria.notes: Excludes time spent reviewing/iterating on preview

criteria.name: Users finish the creation flow
criteria.metric: Percentage of users who start wizard and reach export
criteria.notes: Funnel: topic selection → standards → parameters → preview → export

criteria.name: Preview updates feel instant
criteria.metric: Time from parameter change to preview update
criteria.notes: Layout and formatting changes should be instant. New generation triggers streaming.

criteria.name: Standards alignment is correct
criteria.metric: Generated questions correctly align to selected curriculum standard
criteria.notes: Critical for teacher trust. Misaligned content undermines the core value prop.

criteria.name: PDF export produces usable worksheets
criteria.metric: Exported PDF renders correctly and is print-ready
criteria.threshold: 100% of exports produce valid, printable PDFs
criteria.notes: Test across standard paper sizes (Letter, A4). Include answer key as separate page.

criteria.name: All MVP features functional end-to-end
criteria.notes: Checklist: Worksheet Creator (F-001), Standards Browser (F-002), Export & Print (F-003)

criteria.name: Teachers perceive speed advantage
criteria.metric: User satisfaction with creation speed vs manual methods
criteria.threshold: > 80% rate as 'significantly faster' than manual worksheet creation
criteria.notes: Post-creation survey: 'How does this compare to creating worksheets manually?'

criteria.name: Teachers trust standards alignment
criteria.metric: Teacher confidence in standards alignment of generated content
criteria.notes: Critical for adoption. Teachers won't use if they have to re-verify every question.

criteria.name: Teachers come back to create more
criteria.metric: 7-day return rate after first worksheet creation
criteria.notes: Leading indicator of product-market fit. Track cohort-based return rate.

gates.name: MVP Launch Ready
gates.description: All core functionality works, performs acceptably, and users can complete the primary flow. Must pass before any external users.

gates.name: Beta Ready
gates.description: MVP Launch criteria met plus user perception validated. Teachers find it valuable and trust the output. Must pass before expanding beyond initial test users.
